entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Inefficient heap allocation in SqlServerConvertTranslator #30338
    8.0.0-preview3

Updated

  • Why tracking queries do not update already tracked entities? #30329
  • Optionally map property if column exists, otherwise silently ignore #30322
  • Can't add migration renaming a column on TPC root #30321
    8.0.0
  • HasQueryFilter on Relationship #30339
  • what is the best way to add our own namespace while generating the model via Scaffolding #30332
  • EF6 : DTO with collection property generates LEFT JOIN instead INNER JOIN #30336
  • Scaffolded collection navigation properties do not have setters #30286
    7.0.x
  • Compiled model: Generate code for query filters when possible #24897
    Backlog
  • [Cosmos DB] Support a default value for non-nullable properties #21006
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Add back setter for scaffolded collection navigations #30343
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Evaluate SqlServerConvertTranslator.SupportedMethods once #30340
    auto-merge
  • Add back setter for scaffolded collection navigations #30311
  • Rebrand for 8.0.0-preview3 #30342
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30333
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
